body.name: Lenovo IdeaPad 1 Laptop, 14.0" HD Display, Intel Celeron N4020, 4GB RAM, 64GB Storage, Intel UHD Graphics 600, Windows 11 in S Mode, Ice Blue
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Value Stock and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: This everyday laptop is powered by an Intel Celeron N4020 processor, 4GB DDR4 RAM, and 164 GB M.2 PCIe SSD storage

Microsoft 365 is included (1 year subscription); includes free 3-month trial of Xbox Game Pass Ultimate - Play over 100 high-quality PC games on Windows PC; includes iconic Bethesda games, new day one titles, and the EA Play on PC catalog
Enjoy videos or browse online on a large 14" HD display panel, framed by narrow bezels, while Dolby Audio delivers crystal-clear sound through the built-in dual stereo speakers
Light and slim, this Windows 11 laptop computer (S mode) weighs just over 3 lbs and is less than 1 inch thick
WiFi 802.11 ac and Bluetooth 4.1 connectivity; ports include 2 x USB 3.1 Gen 12 (Type-A), microSD Card Reader; HDMI; Microphone / Earphone Combo
body.description: The Lenovo IdeaPad™ 1 is your daily computing companion. Not only does this affordable laptop deliver amazing performance with an Intel® Celeron® processor, but it also features 64 GB M.2 PCIe SSD storage and a bigger, wider 14-inch HD display for great productivity. Browse the internet, stream your favorite shows, chat with family, or get work done on this reliable notebook computer. With a stylish Ice Blue case, this everyday laptop is easy to use and durable, with long battery life to let you handle daily tasks easily.Great for students, travelers, and those who like to work from home or the local coffee shop, the IdeaPad 1 is lightweight at just over 3 lbs and is less than 1 inch thick, so it's easy to slip into your Lenovo laptop backpack or carrying sleeve. Plus, with up to 8 hours of battery life, you can stay productive no matter where you are! You'll stay connected with integrated WiFi and Bluetooth® while on the go.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Your daily computing companion Lenovo IdeaPad 1 comes with built-in Intel Celeron processor performance, integrated Intel UHD graphics, fast storage and an HD display for outstanding visuals. The IdeaPad 1 laptop is both easy to use and durable with long battery life to let you handle all your daily tasks easily. Plus, a 1 year Microsoft 365 subscription is included for instant productivity.

Built for travel At under 1” thin and weighing in at 1.4kg / 3.09lbs, the IdeaPad 1 can go anywhere. Enjoy all of this laptop’s features on a plane, train, bus, or boat, it won’t get in anyone’s way. With a battery that lasts up to 8 hours*, you’ll be set for the whole day.

Small size, big productivity Engineered with an Intel Celeron processor, the IdeaPad 1 laptop delivers dependable performance as you multitask effortlessly. Communicate with friends and family. Enjoy entertainment. Get your work done. Get the reliable performance that’s expected from Intel powered PCs. And multitasking doesn't stop there. This device includes Microsoft 365 Personal, a convenient 12 month subscription.

Looks as good as it sounds If you're looking for big picture on a compact screen, the IdeaPad 1 is designed with 2-sided narrow borders giving you more viewing area and less clutter, on a crystal-clear HD screen. Dolby Audio delivers robust sound whether you're watching a video or streaming music. With the built-in dual stereo speakers, you're sure to love what you hear on your IdeaPad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made product.
reviews.reviewText: It was an out box unit. It was in perfect condition, not used. Works well with Windows 11.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this strictly to monitor a New Relic dashboard and test various VPN clients. That is all I need. No gaming. This thing works great for what I need and it stays cool…even after running 12 - 14 hours continuously. I bought a nice little clip on lamp for the top of the display. That little USB-powered device is worth it’s weight in gold.My 12 year old son loves his IdeaPad 3, so I got this for myself for work. Money well spent. No complaints.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A Little Slow
reviews.reviewText: This is a good basic computer. It is easy to set up and use, and I like the bonus of getting Microsoft office suite for one year free. I find it a little slow when loading internet pages.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the low price
reviews.reviewText: We bought this lap top for small uses. FB, emails, surfing the web. It's been just what we need. The thinnest and how beautiful the screen color and size was amazing to see. Set up was so easy. I did youtube it to get a jump on it before I bought it and for set up. Which I was so happy I did. Just need a wireless printer and we are good to go! Goodbye desk top.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The laptop is very disappointing. It did not do what I wanted it to do. I can't have apps like, Google, Spotify, and Discord open at the same time without having to go into the task manager to force end it. Sometimes I can't even log in. I have had this issue since the end of 2021 when I bought it. I am sick of having to go for a lap around my neighborhood and still be loading. This computer has been giving me so much trouble that I can't even use it. I stopped using it because it was to slow to handle. I have done everything I can to make it faster but nothing works. I tried to reset the computer but still was slow and laggy. This computer is disappointing. I got this computer with windows 11 and had to downgrade to windows 10 because it was so slow. I have finally lost all my patience with this computer that I'm done using it. I am writing this review because I want to warn everyone before they buy this computer. Very disappointed with this computer. I have tried all the fixes for it but nothing seems to work. I also had a problem in the middle of January 2022 when it would not turn on. I am sick of this computer and it isn't like I gave the computer problems, they occurred right after coming out of the box and a couple days of use. I do not recommend this computer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good and durable
reviews.reviewText: Got this for a friend because her old laptop kept shutting down so i surprised her with this and i didnt regret it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Some limitations with using Google.
reviews.reviewText: You get what you pay for. Not bad for simple needs and uses.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
